text: But...How... I am Aureli, I can't lose... I was supposed to be the greatest at math... THIS IS IMPOSSIBLE! I SHOULD HAVE WON! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
speaker: aureli

text: Your rule of the Calculus Chamber is over, Aureli. Your days of tyranny are no more. Thank you for all of your help, {player name}, peace has been restored to the Calculus Chamber. I shall handle affairs from here on out. Never again shall terror be put upon this land. Itâ€™s all thanks to you. Your bravery and dedication to math have prevailed over the forces of evil. The Aureli Nation will finally be vanquished for good. I am truly grateful that you have brought peace to the Calculus Chamber, {player name}. Goodbye.
speaker: pythagoras
